titleStmt.title: Military discipline: or, the yong artillery man Wherein is discoursed and showne the postures both of musket and pike: the exactest way, &c. Together with the motions which are to be used, in the excercising of a foot-company. With divers and severall formes and figures of battell; with their reducements; very necessary for all such as are studious in the art military. By William Barriff.
titleStmt.author: Barriffe, William.

titleStmt.title: Military discipline: or, the yong artillery man Wherein is discoursed and showne the postures both of musket and pike: the exactest way, &c. Together with the motions which are to be used, in the excercising of a foot-company. With divers and severall formes and figures of battell; with their reducements; very necessary for all such as are studious in the art military. By William Barriff.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Ralph Mab,

notesStmt.note: The last printed page has 17 errata. Some copies have an additional slip with 23 errata including the previous 17.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
